featureGroup.name: Why Saski AI?
featureGroup.description: Simple. Smart. Built for growing businesses

featureGroup.name: The Features That Make Saski AI Different
featureGroup.description: Simple setup, deep integrations, and multichannel support — all built for non-technical teams.

fAQ.question: How many languages do our AI agents support?
fAQ.answer:
AI agents built on Saski AI can understand and respond to customers in 12 languages, making it easy for businesses to support customers worldwide. Once deployed, your agents automatically detect the language of each customer message and provide natural, accurate replies — no manual configuration needed.

The supported languages include:

English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Dutch, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, and Chinese (Simplified).

This multilingual capability allows small businesses to deliver consistent, 24/7 customer support across global markets — without hiring multilingual staff or adding extra tools.

fAQ.question: What type of content can I upload to teach my AI agent?
fAQ.answer: You can upload PDFs, Word documents, text files, or simply paste in content directly. You can also provide website URLs, and the system will extract content automatically. This flexibility allows you to build a rich knowledge base using your existing materials.

fAQ.question: What is Saski AI and who is it for?
fAQ.answer: Saski AI is a no-code platform that helps small and medium-sized business owners create AI assistants to automate customer support, lead capture, scheduling, and more—without needing developers.

fAQ.question: How do I get started with Saski AI?
fAQ.answer: Simply sign up, choose a template or start from scratch, upload your knowledge base (or connect your website), and walk through the guided setup to deploy your first assistant in under 5 minutes.

fAQ.question: Do I need any technical background to use Saski AI?
fAQ.answer: No. Saski AI is designed for non-technical users. You don’t need to write a single line of code.

fAQ.question: Can I create more than one AI assistant?
fAQ.answer: Yes. Depending on your plan, you can create multiple assistants for different parts of your business (e.g., support, sales, or booking).

fAQ.question: Is there a demo or trial available?
fAQ.answer: Yes. We offer a free trial so you can explore the platform and build your first assistant with full access to core features.

fAQ.question: What can I use to train my AI assistant?
fAQ.answer: You can upload PDFs, DOCX files, or connect your website for automatic scraping. The assistant uses this content to answer customer questions accurately.

fAQ.question: Can I update the assistant’s knowledge anytime?
fAQ.answer: You can add new content from various sources like documents and websites to expand your knowledge base. While you can’t remove specific pieces of information once added, you can delete the entire knowledge base and recreate it with the updated content if needed.

fAQ.question: What if the assistant gives a wrong answer?
fAQ.answer: Yes. While our assistants don’t learn from conversations or user data, you can review chat history to identify missing information and update your knowledge base accordingly. Assistants are designed to respond strictly based on your uploaded sources, ensuring accurate, reliable answers with no hallucinations. If you need to change specific information, you can recreate the knowledge base with the updated content.

fAQ.question: Can I restrict what topics the assistant is allowed to answer?
fAQ.answer: Yes. You can define boundaries by customizing the assistant’s instructions and choosing what content to include in the knowledge base. By excluding certain documents or URLs during setup and refining the assistant’s behavior through its instruction template, you control what the assistant can access and respond to.

fAQ.question: Does the assistant support multiple knowledge bases?
fAQ.answer: Each assistant can connect to one knowledge base at a time. However, that knowledge base can be built from multiple sources—including documents, website content, and pasted text—allowing you to combine everything your assistant needs in one place.

fAQ.question: What tools does Saski AI integrate with?
fAQ.answer: Saski AI currently integrates with Calendly, HubSpot, and Shopify, allowing your assistant to schedule meetings, update your CRM, and interact with store data. We’re continuously adding more integrations to support a wider range of business tools—so you can streamline even more of your workflows, all from one place.

fAQ.question: How do I enable integrations in my assistant?
fAQ.answer: During the assistant creation process, you’ll be guided through a setup flow that prompts you to connect tools like Calendly, HubSpot, or Shopify. You simply authorize access when prompted. You can also navigate to the Integrations menu at any time to view available tools, manage connections, or add new ones later.

fAQ.question: Can my assistant use more than one tool at the same time?
fAQ.answer: Yes. Assistants can use multiple tools in a single conversation—like scheduling through Calendly while also updating a lead in HubSpot—so your workflows stay seamless.

fAQ.question: Do I need any technical knowledge to set up integrations?
fAQ.answer: No. We’ve designed the setup to be as simple as possible. Instead of manually generating API tokens, you’ll be guided through a secure authorization and redirection process. This means you can connect tools like Calendly or HubSpot with just a few clicks—no technical steps required.

fAQ.question: Will Saski AI support more integrations in the future?
fAQ.answer: Absolutely. We’re continuously expanding our list of supported tools to help automate more parts of your business. Keep an eye on the Integrations page for new updates.

fAQ.question: Where can I deploy my AI assistant?
fAQ.answer: You can deploy your AI assistant across multiple channels, including your Shopify store, WordPress website, or any custom HTML website. Additionally, assistants can be connected to SMS, WhatsApp, voice calls, and Facebook Messenger—all managed from your Saski AI dashboard.

fAQ.question: Can I use one assistant across multiple channels?
fAQ.answer: Yes. The same assistant can be deployed across multiple channels simultaneously, ensuring a consistent customer experience whether the interaction happens on your website, over WhatsApp, or by phone.

fAQ.question: How do I add the assistant to my website?
fAQ.answer: Login to  Saski AI -> Go Live → Website section . There, you can create a custom chat widget, choose your brand colors, and save it. After saving, a script will be generated for you to copy and paste into your website. If you're using WordPress, we provide a plugin where you can paste the script easily. For Shopify, we offer an app that both embeds the assistant and enables integration with your store.

fAQ.question: How does SMS support work with Saski AI?
fAQ.answer: Each plan includes a certain number of dedicated phone numbers (US & Canada only) that can be used to send and receive SMS messages. Once set up, your AI assistant can reply to incoming SMS inquiries automatically—making customer communication fast and scalable.

fAQ.question: How does voice support work with Saski AI?
fAQ.answer: With voice enabled, you can redirect incoming phone calls to the number provided in your plan. When a customer calls, your AI assistant answers the phone and speaks to the caller using real-time, AI-generated voice responses—perfect for handling bookings, answering FAQs, or collecting lead information.

fAQ.question: Do I need to purchase phone numbers separately?
fAQ.answer: No. Saski AI provides US and Canada phone numbers as part of your subscription. The number of phone numbers included depends on your plan. You can manage your numbers and assign them to assistants directly from your dashboard.

fAQ.question: Can I use the same number for SMS, WhatsApp, and voice?
fAQ.answer: Yes. A single number can be configured to handle SMS, WhatsApp, and voice calls. This unified setup helps keep all your communication channels streamlined under one assistant.

fAQ.question: Can I use Saski AI with WhatsApp?
fAQ.answer: Yes. You can use a dedicated number provided by Saski AI or bring your own WhatsApp Business number. Once connected, your assistant will respond to customer messages on WhatsApp using the same knowledge base and tools—just like it does on your website or SMS.

fAQ.question: Will the assistant respond differently on each channel?
fAQ.answer: No. Each assistant maintains the same knowledge base and behavior across all channels, ensuring a consistent experience for your customers. If you want different tones, instructions, or workflows for different channels, you can create separate assistants and assign them accordingly.

fAQ.question: Is the AI voice natural and customizable?
fAQ.answer: Yes. We use the latest text-to-speech models from Google and AWS (Amazon) , delivering clear and human-like voice responses. You can choose from three male and three female voice options to match your brand’s tone and style.

fAQ.question: How many phone numbers are included in my plan?
fAQ.answer: The number of SMS/WhatsApp/voice-enabled phone numbers depends on your subscription tier. You can view and manage your included numbers from your account dashboard.

fAQ.question: Do I need to enter a credit card to start the trial?
fAQ.answer: No. You can start your 14-day free trial without providing any credit card information. Explore the platform fully before deciding on a paid plan.

fAQ.question: How long is the free trial and what’s included?
fAQ.answer: The trial lasts for 14 days and includes access to all paid features—such as creating assistants, uploading a knowledge base, deploying to channels, and testing integrations like Calendly, HubSpot, and Shopify.

fAQ.question: What happens after my free trial ends?
fAQ.answer: Once your trial ends, your assistants will stop responding until you select a paid plan. We’ll remind you before the trial expires, so you don’t lose access unexpectedly.

fAQ.question: How is payment handled?
fAQ.answer: We use Stripe for secure payments. Once you choose a plan, you can enter your billing details and manage your subscription through your account dashboard.

fAQ.question: What payment methods do you accept?
fAQ.answer: Through Stripe, we accept all major credit cards and digital wallets (Apple Pay, Google Pay, etc.).

fAQ.question: Can I cancel or change my plan at any time?
fAQ.answer: Yes. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your subscription at any time. Changes will be reflected in your billing cycle automatically.

fAQ.question: Are there any setup fees or hidden charges?
fAQ.answer: No. Our pricing is transparent—there are no setup fees, no hidden costs, and no charges during your trial.

fAQ.question: Do you offer annual plans or discounts?
fAQ.answer: Yes. You can choose between monthly or annual billing. Annual plans come with a discounted rate, ideal for businesses looking to save long-term.

fAQ.question: What happens if I exceed my plan limits (e.g., number of assistants or phone numbers)?
fAQ.answer: You’ll receive a notification when you’re nearing your limits. You can then choose to upgrade your plan or manage your usage accordingly.

fAQ.question: Will I lose my data if I don’t subscribe after the trial?
fAQ.answer: No, your data and assistants will be securely stored for a limited period after your trial ends. If you decide not to continue, you also have the option to delete your account and all associated data at any time from your dashboard.

fAQ.question: What is Saski AI and how does it help my business?
fAQ.answer: Saski AI lets you create smart assistants that automate customer support, lead capture, and bookings—across SMS, WhatsApp, websites, and more—without writing a line of code.

fAQ.question: Do I need technical skills to use it?
fAQ.answer: Not at all. Saski AI is built for non-technical business owners. You’ll follow a simple guided flow to create and launch your assistant in minutes.

fAQ.question: What channels can I use Saski AI on?
fAQ.answer: You can deploy your assistant to your website, Shopify store, WordPress, SMS, WhatsApp, voice calls, and Facebook Messenger—all from one place.

fAQ.question: What tools can it connect with?
fAQ.answer: Saski AI integrates with platforms like Calendly, HubSpot, and Shopify to automate scheduling, CRM updates, and product-related support.

fAQ.question: Is there a free trial?
fAQ.answer: Yes. You can try Saski AI free for 14 days—no credit card required.

fAQ.question: What makes Saski AI’s integrations different from other platforms?
fAQ.answer: Most platforms provide integrations that need to be used manually by human agents. With Saski AI, integrations are fully automated and directly accessible to your assistant during live conversations. This allows your assistant to perform actions like scheduling, CRM updates, and order lookups in real time — no human handoff needed.

fAQ.question: How does the Calendly integration work?
fAQ.answer:
When you connect your Calendly account, your assistant can access your real-time availability and suggest open time slots to customers — directly in their local time zone. The assistant collects basic information like the customer’s name and email, then provides a personalized booking link for the selected time.

While the assistant doesn’t book the meeting directly (as Calendly’s API doesn’t allow that), it handles all the upfront steps and guides the customer seamlessly to the final confirmation page. This saves time, reduces drop-off, and makes scheduling much easier for both sides.

fAQ.question: How does SMS work with Saski AI?
fAQ.answer:
Saski AI lets you connect a phone number and deploy your assistant to respond automatically to SMS (text) messages. When customers send a text to your number, the assistant replies in real time — just like it would on your website or WhatsApp — using the same natural language and business logic.
There’s no need for an app or login on the customer’s side. SMS support is ideal for customers who prefer simple, no-friction communication.

fAQ.question: What are tokens, and how do they affect my subscription?
fAQ.answer:
Tokens represent how much your AI assistant can interact with customers. Every message — whether from the customer or the assistant — uses tokens. The more detailed or lengthy the conversation, the more tokens it consumes.

Here’s what that looks like in practice:

A light conversation (e.g., a quick question about a product or order) uses about 10,000 tokens, so 1 million tokens would cover around 100 such conversations.
A heavy conversation (such as in-depth troubleshooting or multiple questions in one session) might use 25,000 to 50,000 tokens, meaning 1 million tokens could support 20 to 40 of these.
Each plan includes a monthly token allowance. When you start getting close to your limit, you’ll have the option to upgrade to a plan that includes more tokens. We don’t sell extra tokens separately — everything is bundled into simple, scalable plans.

fAQ.question: Can I switch to a different plan later?
fAQ.answer: Yes — you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. If your business grows and you need more tokens, assistants, or channels, you can move to a higher plan instantly. If you need fewer resources, you can switch to a smaller plan starting from your next billing cycle. We make it easy to adjust your subscription as your needs change — no long-term commitments required.

fAQ.question: Can I get an invoice or receipt for my payments?
fAQ.answer: Yes. After every successful payment, an invoice and receipt are automatically generated and available in your account dashboard. You can download them anytime for bookkeeping or reimbursement purposes.

fAQ.question: What is included in my plan?
fAQ.answer:
Every Saski AI plan — whether monthly or annual — includes everything you need to automate support, integrate business tools, and deploy your assistant across channels. Here's what’s included:

Starter Plan

$49/month or $490/year
1 AI assistant
1 million tokens per month
1 knowledge base
1 phone number (supports SMS, Voice, and WhatsApp)
Deployment to: Website, WhatsApp, Messenger, SMS, and Voice
Integrations: HubSpot, Calendly, and Shopify
Multilingual support in 12 languages
No-code assistant builder
Lead capture, conversation history, live testing, and knowledge base integration
Business Plan (Most Popular)

$86/month or $858/year
3 AI assistants
3 million tokens per month
3 knowledge bases
3 phone numbers
Includes all features in Starter, with higher limits and added capacity
Enterprise Plan

$129/month or $1,286/year
6 AI assistants
6 million tokens per month
6 knowledge bases
6 phone numbers
Full feature access with maximum limits for scaling teams
All plans are designed to support small and growing businesses with no technical setup required. You can upgrade at any time as your needs grow.

Let me know if you’d like me to write the next FAQ: "What happens when I reach my token limit?" or something else.

fAQ.question: What happens when I reach my token limit?
fAQ.answer:
If you reach your monthly token limit, your assistant will automatically pause and stop responding to new customer messages until your next billing cycle begins. This ensures your usage stays within your plan.
You’ll receive a notification when you're getting close to your limit, so there are no surprises. If you consistently need more conversations, you can upgrade to a higher plan at any time. We don’t offer token top-ups — instead, each plan is designed to scale with your usage.

fAQ.question: Do unused tokens roll over to the next month?
fAQ.answer:
No — unused tokens do not roll over. Each plan includes a monthly token allowance, and the balance resets at the start of each new billing cycle. This keeps your usage aligned with your current plan and simplifies billing.

If you find you're consistently using far fewer tokens than your plan provides, you can downgrade at the end of your billing cycle. Likewise, if you're running out often, upgrading to a higher plan gives you more room to grow.

fAQ.question: What counts as a “token” in practice?
fAQ.answer: Tokens are how we measure usage. Each message — whether it's from a customer or from the assistant — consumes tokens. Short responses use fewer tokens, while longer replies or multi-step interactions use more. A typical light conversation might use around 10,000 tokens, and more complex ones can range from 25,000 to 50,000.

fAQ.question: Can I pause my subscription?
fAQ.answer: We don’t currently offer a pause option. However, you can cancel your subscription and re-subscribe at any time. Your data will be retained for a limited period, so you can pick up where you left off.

fAQ.question: Are phone numbers included in every plan?
fAQ.answer: Yes — each plan includes one or more phone numbers that support SMS, Voice, and WhatsApp. The number of phone numbers you get depends on your plan. You can use them to deploy assistants across channels and handle real-time customer conversations.

fAQ.question: Do you charge tax or VAT on top of the plan price?
fAQ.answer: Yes — applicable taxes may be added at checkout based on your billing address. For Canadian users, GST or HST is applied according to federal and provincial tax rules. International users may see VAT or other region-specific taxes based on local regulations.

fAQ.question: Do you offer refunds?
fAQ.answer: We do not offer refunds for unused time on monthly or annual plans. However, you can cancel at any time and continue using the platform until the end of your billing period. We recommend starting with the free trial to ensure the platform fits your needs.

fAQ.question: Can I switch from monthly to annual billing later?
fAQ.answer: Yes — you can switch from a monthly to an annual plan at any time. The change will take effect at the end of your current billing cycle. Annual plans offer a lower price per month and are ideal for businesses ready to commit long-term.

fAQ.question: Do you offer discounts for nonprofits or educational institutions?
fAQ.answer: At this time, we do not offer dedicated nonprofit or educational discounts. However, our Starter Plan is designed to make automation accessible for small teams and lean organizations.

fAQ.question: What happens if my payment fails?
fAQ.answer: If a payment fails, we’ll notify you right away and attempt to retry it over the next few days. During this time, your assistant will continue to function without interruption. If payment isn’t completed after several attempts, your account may be paused until it’s resolved. You can update your billing information anytime from your dashboard.

fAQ.question: What can my assistant do with HubSpot?
fAQ.answer:
Saski AI assistants don’t just pass along data — they actively manage your CRM workflow during live conversations.

When integrated with HubSpot, your assistant naturally asks for details like name, email, or phone number during a conversation. If a contact doesn’t already exist in your CRM, the assistant creates a new record on the spot.

It can also create support tickets, automatically assigning them a priority level. This can be based on what the customer says — for example, if they explicitly ask for help — or inferred from the tone and context, such as if the assistant detects frustration and can't fully resolve the issue.

This hands-free CRM automation ensures your customer interactions are properly captured and escalated — without involving a human agent.

fAQ.question: How does the Shopify integration help?
fAQ.answer:
With Shopify connected, your Saski AI assistant can directly access your store’s order and product data to answer key customer questions in real time.

For example, when a customer asks “Where is my order?”, the assistant can:

Look up the order status
Provide the tracking number and link (if the order has shipped)
Update the customer with accurate, real-time delivery information
Beyond order tracking, the assistant is also connected to your Shopify product catalog. That means it can:

Answer product-related questions
Search for items based on customer input
Compare products and return details like availability, price, and stock status
All of this happens inside the conversation — without needing a human agent — helping you reduce support volume while delivering fast, accurate service.

fAQ.question: Can I connect more than one tool to the same assistant?
fAQ.answer:
Yes — each assistant can use multiple tools at once. For example, in a single conversation, your assistant can:
Check availability via Calendly
Collect user details and update HubSpot
Look up product info or order status in Shopify
This allows the assistant to handle full workflows from start to finish without human involvement. There’s no need to switch platforms or pass the conversation off — everything happens within the assistant’s natural dialogue.

fAQ.question: Will Saski AI support more tools in the future?
fAQ.answer:
Absolutely. We’re continuously expanding our list of integrations to help you automate more areas of your business. You’ll always be able to view and connect new tools directly from the Integrations page in your dashboard — no developer help required.

If there’s a specific platform you'd like to connect, feel free to request it. We prioritize based on customer needs.

fAQ.question: Where can I deploy my AI assistant?
fAQ.answer:
Saski AI supports full omnichannel deployment. That means you can deploy your assistant across:
Website chat
WhatsApp
Facebook Messenger
SMS (text messaging)
Voice (phone systems)
Once deployed, your assistant can answer questions, guide users, and take action — no matter which channel your customers use. You can enable one or all of these channels, depending on what works best for your business.

fAQ.question: How does WhatsApp work with Saski AI?
fAQ.answer:
Saski AI allows you to deploy your assistant to WhatsApp using a registered WhatsApp Business number.

You have two options:

Register a new number directly through Saski AI, or
Use an existing number, as long as it’s not already connected to another WhatsApp Business API provider.
In both cases, the number must go through Meta’s embedded signup flow, which Saski AI supports natively. After successful registration, the number is linked to your WhatsApp Business account and can then be connected to an AI assistant.

Once registered, a number can be connected to any assistant within your account — and you can disconnect and reassign it to another assistant at any time, as long as it remains registered with WhatsApp.

Note: If your Meta Business Account is not verified, Meta limits you to a maximum of 2 registered numbers across your business.

fAQ.question: Can I use my existing WhatsApp number?
fAQ.answer: Yes — you can bring your own number, as long as it’s not already registered with another WhatsApp Business API provider. During the setup, you’ll be guided through Facebook’s embedded registration process to connect it to your Meta Business Account and activate it for use with Saski AI.

fAQ.question: What if my number is already being used with regular WhatsApp or WhatsApp Business app?
fAQ.answer:
If your phone number is already in use with the regular WhatsApp app or the WhatsApp Business mobile app, you must delete the account before it can be registered for the WhatsApp Business API and used with Saski AI.

Here’s how to do that:

For regular WhatsApp or WhatsApp Business app:

Open the app on your phone
Go to Settings
Tap Account
Select Delete my account
Enter your phone number and confirm the deletion
Important: This action is permanent and will erase your chat history and disconnect the number from any previous use. You cannot use the same number in both the mobile app and the API at the same time.

fAQ.question: Can I connect the same WhatsApp number to more than one assistant?
fAQ.answer: No — each WhatsApp number can only be connected to one assistant at a time. However, you can disconnect a number from one assistant and reassign it to another at any time from your dashboard.

fAQ.question: : Is there a limit to how many WhatsApp numbers I can register?
fAQ.answer: If your business is not verified by Meta, you’re limited to a total of 2 registered WhatsApp Business numbers across your Meta Business Account. Once your business is verified, this restriction is lifted and you can register additional numbers as needed.

fAQ.question: Can I still use the WhatsApp or WhatsApp Business app after connecting the number to Saski AI?
fAQ.answer:
No. Once your number is registered with the WhatsApp Business API and connected to Saski AI, it can no longer be used in the regular WhatsApp or WhatsApp Business mobile app. You will lose access to chat history and mobile-based features tied to the app.

All communication through that number will now flow through the API — meaning conversations are managed entirely by your AI assistant (and optionally your own backend, if integrated), not the mobile app.

fAQ.question: Can I switch back to the WhatsApp app after using the API?
fAQ.answer:
Yes, but you’ll need to delete the number from the WhatsApp Business API via your WhatsApp Business Manager account first. After that, you can reinstall the WhatsApp or WhatsApp Business app and re-register the number.

Please note that doing this will disconnect it from Saski AI and remove all API-based automation. You'll also need to manually verify the number again in the mobile app, and you’ll lose access to API functionality.

fAQ.question: Can the assistant handle inbound and outbound calls?
fAQ.answer: Currently, Saski AI handles inbound voice calls — meaning it answers when a customer calls your number. Outbound calling (initiating calls to customers) may be supported in the future. For now, you can use the platform to manage and automate all incoming calls.

fAQ.question: Will I still be able to see chat history in WhatsApp after switching to the API?
fAQ.answer:
No — once your number is registered with the WhatsApp Business API, you will lose access to any chat history stored in the regular WhatsApp or WhatsApp Business mobile app. The app will no longer work with that number.

However, Saski AI provides a built-in conversation history panel where you can view all messages exchanged between users and your AI assistant. This includes conversations from WhatsApp, as well as from other channels like SMS, Messenger, and your website.

This ensures that you still have full visibility into customer interactions — even though the native WhatsApp app no longer stores or displays them.

fAQ.question: What is the WhatsApp Business Profile section for?
fAQ.answer: This section lets you create your public business profile on WhatsApp. When a customer interacts with your assistant via WhatsApp, the information you provide here — such as your logo, business name, and contact info — will be visible to them. It helps build trust and ensures your brand appears professional and recognizable.

fAQ.question: How does Messenger work with Saski AI?
fAQ.answer:
You can connect your Facebook Business Page to Saski AI and deploy an assistant that responds to messages sent through Facebook Messenger. Once connected, the assistant will automatically handle customer conversations — answering questions, capturing leads, or escalating issues when needed — without requiring a human agent to step in.

This allows your business to maintain fast, 24/7 support directly through Messenger.

fAQ.question: What do I need to connect my Facebook Page?
fAQ.answer:
To connect your Facebook Page to Saski AI, you’ll first need to authorize Saski AI to access your Facebook account. This allows us to retrieve a list of Pages you manage.

Here’s how it works:

Log into your Facebook account when prompted.
Grant Saski AI permission to access your list of Pages.
Choose which Pages you want to make available inside Saski AI.
Once authorized, you can select any of those Pages and connect them to an assistant.
You can always add, remove, or reconnect Pages later through your Saski AI dashboard. Each Page can only be connected to one assistant at a time, but you have full control over which Page is connected and when.

fAQ.question: Can I use Messenger without a Facebook Page?
fAQ.answer: No — Facebook Messenger requires a connected Facebook Business Page. Without a Page, your assistant cannot be deployed on Messenger. If you don’t have a Page yet, you can create one for free on Facebook before connecting it to Saski AI.

fAQ.question: What happens if I remove a Page from Saski AI?
fAQ.answer: If you remove a Facebook Page from your Saski AI account, any assistant connected to that Page will immediately stop responding to Messenger conversations. You can reconnect the Page at any time or assign a different Page to the assistant if needed. No data is lost — your assistant’s configuration and chat history remain intact.

fAQ.question: How does Voice work with Saski AI?
fAQ.answer:
Saski AI allows you to deploy your assistant to a phone number with voice capability, turning it into a smart voice assistant. When someone calls your number, the assistant answers the call, listens to the customer’s voice, and responds with natural-sounding speech using AI-generated responses — all in real time.

This enables you to automate phone-based support without the need for call center staff or voicemail systems.

fAQ.question: Do I need a special number for Voice?
fAQ.answer:
No — Saski AI includes phone numbers in every plan that support both Voice and SMS.

To get started:

Go to the Go Live menu in your dashboard
Click “View Phone Directory”
Select “Get New Number”
Search available Canadian and US numbers by area code, location, or even partial number
Choose a number and register it instantly
Once registered, you can immediately:

Connect the number to any assistant
Select the voice model — Saski AI supports 3 male and 3 female voices for phone calls
Go live in minutes with a fully functional voice assistant
There’s no need for external carriers or technical setup — everything is handled inside the platform.

fAQ.question: Can I customize how the assistant behaves during a phone call?
fAQ.answer:
Yes. The assistant’s behavior is consistent across all channels — including voice — and is fully customizable.

When you create an assistant, Saski AI provides ready-to-use templates designed for different use cases (like customer support ,sales , lead capture etc.. ). These templates define how the assistant greets callers, asks questions, and responds based on what the user says.

You can modify the template during setup, and continue refining it later to match your tone, workflow, and business logic. The same assistant logic applies to voice, chat, SMS, and other channels — so your brand delivers a consistent experience everywhere.

fAQ.question: Do I need to write any code to change how the assistant behaves on voice calls?
fAQ.answer:
No coding is needed. You can customize your assistant’s behaviour  and responses through a no-code interface when setting up or editing the assistant. You’ll be able to:
Adjust greetings and fallback responses
Set escalation rules
Decide which tools (like CRM or scheduling) the assistant can use during the call
Choose the voice model (male/female)
All changes apply automatically across all connected channels, including phone.

fAQ.question: What voice models are available for phone calls?
fAQ.answer: Saski AI offers a selection of 6 professional voice models — 3 male and 3 female — to match your brand tone and caller expectations. When assigning a voice number to an assistant, you can choose which voice model will be used for phone conversations. You can change this at any time from your dashboard.

fAQ.question: Can the voice assistant understand different languages or accents?
fAQ.answer:
Currently, Saski AI’s voice assistant supports English and French. It can handle a wide range of English accents and respond fluently in either language depending on how your assistant is configured.

While our AI assistants support 12 languages across chat channels, voice-based conversations are limited to English and French at this time. We recommend testing any multilingual use case thoroughly before going live.

fAQ.question: Can calls be forwarded to a human agent if needed?
fAQ.answer:
Not yet. At this time, Saski AI does not support live call forwarding to a human agent. All calls are handled entirely by the AI assistant.

However, this is a feature we're actively exploring for future development. In the meantime, the assistant can still capture detailed caller information, summarize the issue, and notify your team through integrated tools like HubSpot ticketing or chat history in the platform.

fAQ.question: How long can a phone call last?
fAQ.answer: There’s no fixed time limit imposed by Saski AI. However, most successful AI-assisted calls last between 2 to 5 minutes, depending on complexity. If the assistant cannot resolve the issue within a few exchanges, it can be configured to escalate or end the call politely to avoid circular conversations.

fAQ.question: Do I need to register a separate number for SMS?
fAQ.answer:
No — there’s no need to register a separate number. The same number you use for Voice or WhatsApp can also be used for SMS, as long as it supports that capability. Saski AI provides voice- and SMS-enabled numbers by default in all plans.

You can register and manage numbers from the Go Live > Phone Directory screen, search by area code or locality, and assign that number to your assistant immediately.

fAQ.question: Can one number be used across SMS, Voice, and WhatsApp?
fAQ.answer:
Yes — Saski AI supports unified phone numbers. A single number can handle:
SMS conversations
Voice calls
WhatsApp messages
You can connect all three channels to the same assistant or assign them separately based on your communication needs. This makes it easier to manage customer communication across platforms while keeping a consistent business identity.

fAQ.question: Can I see SMS conversations in the Conversation History panel?
fAQ.answer: Yes. All SMS conversations are logged just like chats from other channels. You can view the full message history between your assistant and any customer who contacted you via SMS, including timestamps and captured lead details.

fAQ.question: Do customers need to install anything to chat via SMS?
fAQ.answer: No. SMS works natively on any mobile phone. Customers simply send a text to your assigned number, and your assistant responds — no apps, downloads, or logins required.

fAQ.question: Can I use international SMS numbers?
fAQ.answer: At this time, Saski AI provides Canadian and US numbers only. These numbers can send and receive SMS messages from most international carriers, but local regulations and deliverability may vary depending on the recipient's country.

fAQ.question: How do I deploy my assistant to my website?
fAQ.answer:
To deploy your assistant on your website:

Go to Go Live in your dashboard
Click Publish
Enter your website URL (must start with http:// or https://)
Choose the assistant you want to connect
Click Personalize Assistant
After customizing the widget’s appearance and behavior, Saski AI will generate a script tag. Copy and paste this script into the footer section of your website. Once added, the chat widget will appear on your site and begin responding to visitors immediately.

fAQ.question: Do you support WordPress?
fAQ.answer: Yes — we offer a WordPress plugin that makes it easy to install the assistant. Just install the plugin, paste in your script, and the widget will appear across your site without needing to edit your theme files manually.

fAQ.question: Can I deploy Saski AI on my Shopify store?
fAQ.answer:
Yes — Saski AI provides a dedicated Shopify app that supports two key features:

Store Access: Once installed, the app allows your assistant to securely access your Shopify store data. This enables it to answer real-time questions about products, order statuses, inventory, and more — directly inside a conversation with your customers.
Widget Deployment: The same app also gives you a space to paste the script tag generated from Saski AI. This lets you easily embed the chat widget on your storefront without editing your theme code manually.
Together, these features allow your assistant to both appear on your Shopify site and act on customer requests using your live store data — all without requiring technical setup.

fAQ.question: Can I change the chat widget’s appearance after publishing it?
fAQ.answer:
Yes — you can update the widget’s appearance, messaging, and positioning at any time from your Go Live > Publish section. Changes are applied immediately without needing to replace the script on your site. This includes updates to:

Assistant name
Welcome message
Avatars and chat icon
Widget color and positioning
Input placeholder or greeting

fAQ.question: Can I match the chat widget colors to my website’s theme?
fAQ.answer:
Yes — Saski AI gives you full control over the visual styling of the chat widget so it matches your website’s design perfectly. You can customize colors for every part of the interface, including:

User Message
Background Color
Text Color
Assistant Message
Background Color
Text Color
Input Container (where users type their message)
Background Color
Text Color
Chat Container (overall background of the widget)
Background Color
All changes are made using a simple color picker, and you can preview your updates in real time before going live. These customizations apply instantly without needing to replace the widget script on your website.

fAQ.question: Where does the chat widget appear on my site?
fAQ.answer:
You can choose the widget’s position from 6 predefined options:

Top Right
Bottom Right
Top Left
Bottom Left
Center Left
Center Right
You can also adjust horizontal and vertical spacing to control exactly where the widget sits on screen — whether desktop or mobile.

fAQ.question: Is the website chat widget mobile-friendly?
fAQ.answer: Yes — the widget is fully responsive and works across all screen sizes. On mobile, it adapts to fit the smaller screen and maintains a smooth user experience, just like on desktop.

fAQ.question: Can I deploy the widget on multiple websites?
fAQ.answer: Yes. You can use the same script on multiple domains if needed, or generate unique scripts for each site if you're using different assistants. Just add the correct website URL when publishing the assistant, then paste the script where needed.

htmlSection.name: Terms of Service
htmlSection.htmlContent:
Terms of Service

Effective Date: June 30, 2025

These Terms of Service (“Terms”) govern your use of Saski AI, a platform developed and operated by HiQSense Smart Systems LTD (“we,” “our,” or “us”), a federally registered Canadian corporation based in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan. By accessing or using the Saski AI platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

1. Eligibility & Account Registration

You must be at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into a binding agreement to use the platform. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and any activity under your account.

2. Platform Use & Restrictions

  • Use the platform only for lawful business purposes.
  • Do not attempt to reverse engineer, interfere with, or abuse the system.
  • Do not upload or generate harmful, abusive, or illegal content.
  • Respect third-party integrations and services used within the platform.

3. Subscriptions, Billing & Cancellations

Saski AI is offered on a subscription basis. Billing is handled via Stripe and may be monthly or annually depending on your selected plan.

  • Free trials are available for 14 days. No card is required.
  • You may cancel at any time. Access remains until the end of the billing period.
  • Subscription fees are non-refundable unless otherwise stated in writing.

4. Integrations & Third-Party Services

The platform allows integration with tools such as Calendly, HubSpot, and Zendesk. We are not responsible for any loss or damages caused by third-party failures, changes, or data processing practices.

5. Intellectual Property

Saski AI and all related intellectual property (code, UI, documentation, branding) remain the property of HiQSense Smart Systems LTD. You retain rights to the content you provide and generate using the platform.

6. Termination

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you breach these Terms or use the platform inappropriately. You may also terminate your subscription at any time through your dashboard.

7. Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by law, HiQSense Smart Systems LTD shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. Our total liability is limited to the amount paid for the service in the previous 6 months.

8. Disclaimer

The platform is provided “as is” without warranties of any kind. While we strive to offer reliable and secure services, we do not guarantee uninterrupted functionality or accuracy of automated responses.

9. Governing Law

These Terms are governed by the laws of the Province of Saskatchewan and the federal laws of Canada applicable therein.

10. Contact

For any questions regarding these Terms, you can contact us at customer.care@saskiai.com or call +1 306 261 8582.

htmlSection.name: Cookie Policy
htmlSection.htmlContent:
Cookie Policy

Effective Date: June 30, 2025

This Cookie Policy explains how HiQSense Smart Systems LTD (“we,” “our,” or “us”), doing business as Saski AI, uses cookies and similar technologies on our website and platform. By using Saski AI, you agree to the use of cookies as outlined below.

1. What Are Cookies?

Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember information about your session, preferences, and interactions.

2. Types of Cookies We Use

  • Essential Cookies: Required for core functionality, such as login sessions and account access.
  • Functional Cookies: Help remember your settings and improve your experience (e.g., language preferences).
  • Analytics Cookies: Used to understand how users interact with our platform and improve performance (e.g., Google Analytics).

3. Third-Party Cookies

Some cookies may be set by third-party services integrated into Saski AI, such as embedded calendars, chat, or analytics tools. These providers have their own privacy and cookie policies.

4. Managing Cookies

You can control or delete cookies at any time through your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect the functionality of some features on Saski AI.

5. Updates to This Policy

We may update this Cookie Policy periodically. The effective date at the top of this page reflects the latest version.

6. Contact

For questions or concerns about our use of cookies, contact us at customer.care@saskiai.com or call +1 306 261 8582.

htmlSection.name: Refund Policy
htmlSection.htmlContent:
Refund Policy

Effective Date: June 30, 2025

This Refund Policy outlines how HiQSense Smart Systems LTD (“we,” “our,” or “us”), doing business as Saski AI, handles refund requests for subscriptions and services provided through the Saski AI platform.

1. Free Trial

We offer a 14-day free trial on all plans. No payment is required to start the trial, and you may cancel at any time before the trial ends to avoid being charged.

2. Paid Subscriptions

  • Subscription charges are billed in advance via Stripe.
  • All payments are final and non-refundable, including partial periods, unless stated otherwise below.
  • You may cancel your subscription at any time through your account dashboard to avoid future charges.

3. Eligible Refunds

Refunds may be granted under the following conditions:

  • You were charged after canceling your subscription before the renewal date.
  • You experienced a platform-wide outage lasting more than 5 consecutive days.
  • You were mistakenly charged due to a billing error.

4. How to Request a Refund

To request a refund, please email customer.care@saskiai.com with your account details and a description of the issue. We aim to respond within 3 business days.

5. Exceptions

We reserve the right to deny refund requests that fall outside the eligibility conditions or where misuse of the platform is evident.

6. Contact

For questions about this policy, reach out to us at customer.care@saskiai.com or call +1 306 261 8582.

htmlSection.name: Privacy Policy
htmlSection.htmlContent:
Privacy Policy

Effective Date: June 30, 2025

HiQSense Smart Systems LTD (“we,” “our,” or “us”), doing business as Saski AI, is the developer and operator of the Saski AI platform. We are a federally registered Canadian corporation headquartered in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal data when you interact with our platform.

1. Information We Collect

  • Personal Information: Your name, email, business name, billing info, and communication preferences.
  • Usage Data: Device details, browser type, IP address, interaction logs, and visited pages.
  • Third-Party Integrations: Data shared via tools you connect (CRMs, schedulers, communication platforms).

2. How We Use Your Information

  • To operate, maintain, and optimize the Saski AI platform.
  • To manage user accounts, subscriptions, and billing.
  • To provide customer support and respond to inquiries.
  • To monitor system performance and improve reliability.
  • To comply with legal obligations, including under PIPEDA (Canada).

3. Sharing Your Information

We do not sell your personal data. We only share it with trusted vendors essential to delivering our service:

  • Stripe for payment processing
  • AWS or GCP for secure cloud hosting
  • Analytics and performance tools
  • Integrations you explicitly activate (e.g., Calendly, HubSpot)

4. Data Security

We use strong encryption, secure hosting, access restrictions, and continual monitoring to safeguard your data. While no system is infallible, we work to industry standards to mitigate risks.

5. Data Retention

We retain personal data as long as your account is active or as required for regulatory, legal, or operational needs. You may request deletion at any time.

6. Your Rights

Canadian users have the right to access, modify, or delete their personal data. To make a request, email us at customer.care@saskiai.com or call +1 306 261 8582.

7. International Transfers

If your data is processed outside Canada (e.g., by third-party providers), we ensure legal safeguards and contractual protections are in place.

8. Cookie Usage

We use cookies to support logins, save settings, and track usage patterns via analytics. You can manage or disable cookies in your browser at any time.

htmlSection.name: AUP
htmlSection.htmlContent:
Acceptable Use Policy

Effective Date: June 30, 2025

This Acceptable Use Policy outlines the rules and restrictions governing the use of the Saski AI platform, developed and operated by HiQSense Smart Systems LTD (“we,” “our,” or “us”), doing business as Saski AI. By using the platform, you agree to comply with this policy at all times.

1. Prohibited Activities

You may not use Saski AI to:

  • Upload or distribute content that is unlawful, abusive, harassing, defamatory, or obscene.
  • Violate any applicable local, provincial, federal, or international laws or regulations.
  • Send spam, phishing messages, or unsolicited promotional content.
  • Infringe on the intellectual property rights of others.
  • Attempt to bypass authentication or security measures.
  • Interfere with, disrupt, or degrade the performance or integrity of the platform.
  • Reverse-engineer, decompile, or otherwise attempt to extract source code or system design.

2. Responsibility for Content

You are solely responsible for any data, documents, or content you submit or generate through Saski AI. We reserve the right to remove or restrict access to any content that violates this policy.

3. Enforcement & Consequences

Violations of this policy may result in temporary suspension or permanent termination of your account, and may involve legal action if warranted. We reserve the right to report unlawful behavior to relevant authorities.

4. Reporting Abuse

If you become aware of any misuse or violations of this policy, please report it to customer.care@saskiai.com.

5. Contact

For any questions regarding this policy, contact us at customer.care@saskiai.com or +1 306 261 8582.
